Did you notice that your cursor and desktop are different? That's because we're in Hack Mode now.
When you're in Hack Mode, you can flip programs and hack them - just like that puzzle.
Hack Mode is controlled by that switch *over there* - See it?

If you switch it to OFF, youâ€™ll go back to the regular EndlessOS desktop.
You can use the computer like you did before you knew about Hack mode.
You can flip the switch if someone else needs to use the computer, or you need to do your homework.

Now that we're here, there's a lot to go over. This main area is called 'The Clubhouse.'
It's a virtual place where anyone from The Academy can hang out, chat, collaborate, or whatever you like. 
We might all be in different physical locations, but we always have a presence here.
If you see someone here, it means they're happy to talk to you, and that's the quickest way to start learning and having fun.

Welcome to the world of Hack!
Here, you can learn the secrets of the world you live in, and how to make them work for you.
If that sounds magical and mysterious, don't worry - we're here to help you learn.
My name's Ada, and I'm an Academy graduate, so I've done this before. I'll be your guide.
Great job on the entrance puzzle, by the way. Not many students solve that without help.
I was your guide for the entrance puzzle, by the way. I didn't want to break your concentration by introducing myself.
I wonder if anything happened to the gate? Click the Flip to Hack button again.
Beautiful! All new students must solve this puzzle.
Match it by moving the sliders and the doors will unlock.
Keep trying! Move the sliders until the gold wave fits into the groove.
How do you open a locked gate with no key?
